Sery-ously?\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/2926860-serena-sery-ously\"><img alt=\"Serena.. Sery-ously?\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1456926939p2/2926860.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/335297079?book_show_action=false\">Jul 22, 2013</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Serena.. Sery-ously?\" class=\"user\" name=\"Serena.. Sery-ously?\" href=\"/user/show/2926860-serena-sery-ously\">Serena.. Sery-ously?</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Hardcover 9788884513441\" href=\"/book/show/3399931-harry-potter-e-l-ordine-della-fenice\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer335297079\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer967295735700941856\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1380378652i/734411.png\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br><b>Innanzitutto, un grazie speciale per avermi seguito in questa lettura :3 E' stata una lettura un pizzico meno dolorosa...</b><br><br>Mi sono sempre detta che il mio preferito fra tutti era il terzo; si vede che non ho letto con sufficiente attenzione il quinto le altre volte, perchU+00E9 non vedo come sia possibile non assegnargli il primo posto.<br><br>Questo libro U+00E8 cosU+00EC intenso, cosU+00EC meravigliosamente doloroso, cosU+00EC perfetto, cosU+00EC <b>tanto</b>.. Ho riso, ho pianto, ho avuto il magone, mi ha fatto svuotare il cervello al mom</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText967295735700941856\" style=\"display:none\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1380378652i/734411.png\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br><b>Innanzitutto, un grazie speciale per avermi seguito in questa lettura :3 E' stata una lettura un pizzico meno dolorosa...</b><br><br>Mi sono sempre detta che il mio preferito fra tutti era il terzo; si vede che non ho letto con sufficiente attenzione il quinto le altre volte, perchU+00E9 non vedo come sia possibile non assegnargli il primo posto.<br><br>Questo libro U+00E8 cosU+00EC intenso, cosU+00EC meravigliosamente doloroso, cosU+00EC perfetto, cosU+00EC <b>tanto</b>.. Ho riso, ho pianto, ho avuto il magone, mi ha fatto svuotare il cervello al momento di maggiore necessitU+00E0, mi ha fatto evadere dalla realtU+00E0, mi ha fatto male fisicamente.<br>E poco importa che io abbia letto il libro almeno altre quattro volte, che sapessi benissimo come sarebbe andata a finire (ma dentro di me, una piccola speranza che questa volte le cose sarebbero state diverse non si U+00E8 mai arresa): il libro U+00E8 un vortice di emozioni che poche volte ho avuto la fortuna e l'onore di provare..<br>Le ultime 150 pagine sono intensissime, qualcosa di straordinario e ad un certo punto ho avuto una stretta allo stomaco tale che ho dovuto interrompere la lettura per un po'..<br>E se non avessi tanti libri da leggere, giuro che lo rileggerei seduta stante.<br><br>Il mondo U+00E8 bello perchU+00E9 esistono persone come la Rowling, ecco la veritU+00E0 :')<br><br><b>Ora che ho espresso il mio amore totale e la mia dedizione assoluta al mio idolo, vado a chiudermi nel silenzio del dolore per la morte di <a class=\"jsShowSpoiler spoilerAction\">(view spoiler)</a><span class=\"spoilerContainer\" style=\"display: none\">[Sirius <a class=\"jsHideSpoiler spoilerAction\">(hide spoiler)</a>]</span>, che, come tutte le altre volte, mi ha colpito con violenza, quasi fosse stato un mio amico. Ma che dico, lui U+00E8 mio amico. Cattiva Zia Row, questa volta te l'avevo chiesto gentilmente di risparmiarlo!! *Lacrime amare*</b><br><br><br>**La recensione U+00E8 quella che U+00E8 perchU+00E9 non sarei in grado di scrivere altro, tanto che questo libro U+00E8 l'unico della serie che ho recensito finora.. Ma sento che glielo dovevo alla Rowling, a Harry, a Sirius, a tutti loro**</[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></span>\n  <a p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/42662881-fadwa-word-wonders?shelf=favorites\">favorites</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1516787664\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer4594944715825409117\">FIN-FREAKIN-ALLY ! I feel like this book took me tooo long to finish, and it actually did but it also was because A LOT of things were happening ! <br />This installment's plot is -in my opinion- the most complex so far (though I know it gets crazier as we go) and I loved it! Dumbledore's army is one of my favorite parts of the whole series and my favorite movie scene. OMG AND WHAT A SAVAGE DUMBLEDORE IS AHAHAHA! He slays they Death Eaters and his calm attitude about it is hilarious, he's like \"I'm th</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText4594944715825409117\" style=\"display:none\">FIN-FREAKIN-ALLY ! I feel like this book took me tooo long to finish, and it actually did but it also was because A LOT of things were happening ! <br />This installment's plot is -in my opinion- the most complex so far (though I know it gets crazier as we go) and I loved it! Dumbledore's army is one of my favorite parts of the whole series and my favorite movie scene. OMG AND WHAT A SAVAGE DUMBLEDORE IS AHAHAHA! He slays they Death Eaters and his calm attitude about it is hilarious, he's like \"I'm the boss and I know it\". <br />Oh and I love how Harry finally explodes in this book, it was bound to happen, it would've been unrealistic any other way. Praise the Lord for the Weasley twins. Umbridge is dreadful and I just needed her to go away. I wanted to slap Fudge in the face. I love how protective of Harry the members of the Order are. AND WHO TRUSTS A HOUSE-ELF NAMED KREACHER? You stupid people had it coming because his name was already a red flag.<br />Okay, this review is the most nonsensical thing I've put out there but I have way too many feels to be even remotely coherent. class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/1353344700?book_show_action=false\">Sep 25, 2016</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Jesica\" class=\"user\" name=\"Jesica\" href=\"/user/show/44637869-jesica\">Jesica</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">really liked it</span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p0\"></span></span>\n\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/44637869-jesica?shelf=worth-re-read\">worth-re-read</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1353344700\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer16223418153186777891\">4.5 stars out of 5<br /><br />I donU+2019t like how Harry got angry easily in this book. Very unlike himself. But I really love how other characters becomes more important here, especially the addition of Neville, Luna and Ginny to the usual Harry, Ron and Hermione trio. I love how Neville got a lot more impressive here. Not the shy clumsy boy he was anymore. I also found Luna very interesting. SheU+2019s weird, no doubt, and she has the most unusual fashion style but she has her own unique charm I like. However, Dol</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText16223418153186777891\" style=\"display:none\">4.5 stars out of 5<br /><br />I donU+2019t like how Harry got angry easily in this book. Very unlike himself. But I really love how other characters becomes more important here, especially the addition of Neville, Luna and Ginny to the usual Harry, Ron and Hermione trio. I love how Neville got a lot more impressive here. Not the shy clumsy boy he was anymore. I also found Luna very interesting. SheU+2019s weird, no doubt, and she has the most unusual fashion style but she has her own unique charm I like. However, Dolores Umbridge stole most of my attention in this book. SheU+2019s a very impressive female villain. I always find evil ladies who tries to act all sweet and nice very creepy. Umbrigde kind of remind me to another evil lady in a book I read recently, Ursula Monkton from Neil GaimanU+2019s book, The Ocean at The End of The Lane. SheU+2019s super creepy too. Anyway, back to Harry Potter, I kind of dislike the order of phoenix concept. They didnU+2019t feel solid enough for me. I mean if you-know-who had been keeping low profile then what exactly did they do? They seemed awfully busy. Not that I take prime ministerU+2019s side, but that way they did seem suspicious to those who didnU+2019t believe you-know-whoU+2019s return. And the way they kept almost everything from the kids is just felt wrong. Harry, too, was not very helpful to make people want to believe him with all his attitude. As an outsider, I have to say, it is easier to believe the daily prophetU+2019s version as they serve more proofs. Compared to the previous books, this book is more emotional especially with some romance between Harry and Cho Chang. Not that itU+2019s bad, but I never liked that pair. As a Ravenclaw, thus a smart girl, who is a year older than Harry, Cho was quite childish. But the whole story is great despite the sad ending that seemed to gets worse in each book of this series. It is also the first that include important places other than Hogwarts like the ministry and St. Mungo Hospital.</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"16223418153186777891\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/144482083\" />\n    <a title=\"Denise\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/4877957-denise\"><img alt=\"Denise\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1296828889p2/4877957.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/144482083?book_show_action=false\">Jan 28, 2016</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Denise\" class=\"user\" name=\"Denise\" href=\"/user/show/4877957-denise\">Denise</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Mass Market Paperback 9780747570738\" href=\"/book/show/862714.Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/4877957-denise?shelf=own\">own</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/4877957-denise?shelf=favourites\">favourites</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/4877957-denise?shelf=read-2016\">read-2016</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer144482083\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer8426866049526248689\">Voldemort is back, but the Ministry of Magic denies all such claims and refuses to acknowledge even the possibility that it might be true. Instead, Ministry and media alike begin a campaign to discredit Dumbledore, Harry and anyone else who dares to speak about Voldemort's return. After another long, miserable summer with the Dursleys and completely out of touch with what's happening in the wizarding world, Harry finally learns that while no help from the Ministry is forthcoming in standing</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText8426866049526248689\" style=\"display:none\">Voldemort is back, but the Ministry of Magic denies all such claims and refuses to acknowledge even the possibility that it might be true. Instead, Ministry and media alike begin a campaign to discredit Dumbledore, Harry and anyone else who dares to speak about Voldemort's return. After another long, miserable summer with the Dursleys and completely out of touch with what's happening in the wizarding world, Harry finally learns that while no help from the Ministry is forthcoming in standing against Voldemort, Dumbledore has called the old resistance movement from the first war back together: The Order of the Phoenix. But nobody will tell Harry and his friends exactly what they think Voldemort is planning and what the Order is up to, insisting they are far too young and to be kept out of the loop. More frustration comes upon the return to Hogwarts: A Ministry official has been put onto the Hogwarts staff and is slowly but surely asserting more and more control over the school in order to keep both students and teachers firmly under the Ministry's thumb. And then there are the strange dreams Harry has more and more often, stemming from his strange connection to Voldemort...<br /><br />At almost a thousand pages, this is the longest book in the series, but it certainly never gets boring. One of the things I really like about J.K. Rowling's books is that her teenagers actually behave like teenagers - and here, at 15, Harry and friends have well and truly hit puberty, with all its rashness, frustration, hormonal imbalance, temper tantrums and feeling oh so very misunderstood. It makes the characters, magical as they are, so much more realistic. Prior to beginning my re-read of the series, I had also forgotten how much we don't know until this book - \"Order of the Phoenix\" is a gamechanger in many ways, and things look bleaker than ever at its end, with story and characters alike having grown up a lot since the first book.</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"8426866049526248689\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" I just love this book... Also, I cried a lot while reading the last 100 pages... I might have grown too attached to the characters... And, I'll be reading the half-blood prince next.</span>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" id=\"update_comment_stuff_Review1755830041\">\n  <td colspan=\"2\">\n    <div class=\"updateActionLinks\">\n        <a class=\"right flag\" rel=\"nofollow\" itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/1456645667\" />\n    <a title=\"Frahorus\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/26190517-frahorus\"><img alt=\"Frahorus\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1464165301p2/26190517.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/1456645667?book_show_action=false\">May 02, 2016</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Frahorus\" class=\"user\" name=\"Frahorus\" href=\"/user/show/26190517-frahorus\">Frahorus</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">really liked it</span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p0\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Hardcover 9788884513441\" href=\"/book/show/3399931-harry-potter-e-l-ordine-della-fenice\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/26190517-frahorus?shelf=fantasy\">fantasy</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/26190517-frahorus?shelf=letteratura-inglese\">letteratura-inglese</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/26190517-frahorus?shelf=duemila\">duemila</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1456645667\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer4055819654312176768\">Purtroppo ho dovuto interrompere la lettura piU+00F9 volte per motivi temporali e altri contrattempi. Peccato, me lo sarei goduto sicuramente di piU+00F9. <br /><br />Ormai devo dire che mi sono affezionato, come Silente, a Harry. E le sue avventure sono coincise con delle fasi della mia vita molto importanti che ancora oggi non si sono concluse ma, forse, stanno per terminare per permettermi di passare a una nuova fase. <br /><br />Ritroviamo Harry che rischia di essere sbattuto fuori da Hogwarts dopo aver incontrato e usato la</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText4055819654312176768\" style=\"display:none\">Purtroppo ho dovuto interrompere la lettura piU+00F9 volte per motivi temporali e altri contrattempi. Peccato, me lo sarei goduto sicuramente di piU+00F9. <br /><br />Ormai devo dire che mi sono affezionato, come Silente, a Harry. E le sue avventure sono coincise con delle fasi della mia vita molto importanti che ancora oggi non si sono concluse ma, forse, stanno per terminare per permettermi di passare a una nuova fase. <br /><br />Ritroviamo Harry che rischia di essere sbattuto fuori da Hogwarts dopo aver incontrato e usato la magia per difendersi (sia lui che suo cugino) dall'attacco dei dissennatori, ma per fortuna il preside Silente riesce a provare la sua innocenza. Questo quinto anno alla scuola di stregoneria sarU+00E0, per Harry, dopo quello che U+00E8 accaduto alla fine del quarto - ricordate, la morte di Diggory per mano di Voldemort rinato e lui che U+00E8 riuscito a salvarsi per un pelo dall'essere eliminato dall'Oscuro Signore - il piU+00F9 solitario (ad un certo punto spariranno Silente e Hagrid, quest'ultimo un vero e proprio fratello maggiore per Harry) e dove verrU+00E0 messa alla prova la sua sopportazione. Harry U+00E8 irrequieto per via del fatto che Lui U+00E8 tornato e ha intenzione di eliminarlo, stressato perchU+00E9 si sente non capito dai suoi migliori amici, incavolato perchU+00E9 Silente intenzionalmente lo ignora e ha continue visioni di ciU+00F2 che fa Voldemort. E, come ciliegiena sulla torta, arriva la professoressa Humbridge che diventa insopportabile a tutti. Ma Hermione ha un'idea: creare l'Esercito di Silente dove i ragazzi possano davvero allenarsi a difendersi dalle incombenti minacce di Voldemort. <br /><br />Come ho giU+00E0 scritto nel romanzo precedente, il quarto, ormai le avventure di Harry sono abbastanza Dark, ci sono morti, ammazzamenti, stregonerie, Mangiamorte che uccidono o che ci provano, insomma, ormai la situazione diventa sempre piU+00F9 incandescente e pericolosa. Non vedo l'ora di divorare il sesto.</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"4055819654312176768\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n 2016</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Rivka Ray\" class=\"user\" name=\"Rivka Ray\" href=\"/user/show/38496373-rivka-ray\">Rivka Ray</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">liked it</span><span title=\"liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p0\"></span><span title=\"liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p0\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Hardcover 9780439358064\" href=\"/book/show/77522.Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/38496373-rivka-ray?shelf=childrens\">childrens</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/38496373-rivka-ray?shelf=fantasy\">fantasy</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1580251142\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer10798474704143251354\">POSSIBLY SEMI-SPOILERY-ISH: READ AT YOUR OWN RISK<br /><br />Things I liked:<br />- Anything to do with Fred and George<br />- Ginny and Neville's increased characterization<br />- This being the first book where I really like Hermione<br />- Peeves (I'm not sure why exactly, but my like of this character increases with each book. My sister thinks I'm crazy)<br />- Dumbledore's Army<br />- Occlumency lessons<br />- Snape (not sure this is a like, but there is a certain amount of intrigue surrounding him. And I think Harry is just as unforgiving by</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText10798474704143251354\" style=\"display:none\">POSSIBLY SEMI-SPOILERY-ISH: READ AT YOUR OWN RISK<br /><br />Things I liked:<br />- Anything to do with Fred and George<br />- Ginny and Neville's increased characterization<br />- This being the first book where I really like Hermione<br />- Peeves (I'm not sure why exactly, but my like of this character increases with each book. My sister thinks I'm crazy)<br />- Dumbledore's Army<br />- Occlumency lessons<br />- Snape (not sure this is a like, but there is a certain amount of intrigue surrounding him. And I think Harry is just as unforgiving by not taking Snape more seriously and failing to remember that he is part of the Order.)<br />- Dumbledore's infamous end of book wisdom<br />- Harry's discussion with Nearly Headless Nick<br /><br />Things I did not like:<br />- Harry's annoying attitude<br />- Harry making obviously stupid decisions<br />- The nonsensical Thestrals explanation<br />- No one taking Kreacher more seriously (it's pretty obvious, isn't it?)<br />- The entire premise is built on Harry not knowing things<br />- No real mystery holding the plot together<br />- The book is longer than it needs to be<br /><br />Meh things:<br />- Grawp<br />- Luna Lovegood<br />- Ron (sadly, as Ron has previously been a favorite character)<br />- Snape's memory (I liked learning more about Snape, but Harry was being rude, selfish, and stupid)<br />- Umbridge (other than her interesting detention, I just never took her seriously)<br />- Sirius (don't kill me)<br />- The centaurs (I had really liked them in previous books) <br /><br /><br />When I was reading The Goblet of Fire, which is only 136 less pages, I forgot how long it was because I was enjoying the story so much. It could have been longer, and I wouldn't have minded. That never happened with The Order of the Phoenix. I was painfully aware just how long this book was. *sigh*</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"10798474704143251354\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n class=\"elementListBrownSeparator\"></div>\n\n\n\n  <div class=\"friendReviews elementListBrown\" >\n    <div class=\"section\">\n      \n\n<div id=\"review_159410405\" class=\"review\" itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/159410405\" />\n    <a title=\"Mary JL\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/1734736-mary-jl\"><img alt=\"Mary JL\" src=\"https://s.gr-assets.com/assets/nophoto/user/f_5f-6a03a5c12233c941481992b82eea8d23.png\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/159410405?book_show_action=false\">Aug 19, 2011</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Mary JL\" class=\"user\" name=\"Mary JL\" href=\"/user/show/1734736-mary-jl\">Mary JL</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">really liked it</span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p0\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Hardcover 9780439358064\" href=\"/book/show/77522.Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix\">review of another edition</a>\n\n          <div><span class=\"uitext greyText\">Recommends it for: </span>\n           <span class=\"uitext reviewText\">anybody</span></div>\n\n          <div>\n    <span class=\"greyText\">Recommended to Mary JL by: </span>\n      About 26 different people at one time or another\n  </div>\n\n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/1734736-mary-jl?shelf=main-sf-fantasy\">main-sf-fantasy</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer159410405\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer14956509594840008941\">With thousands of reviews on this book, I am unlikely to say anything new, so I will just say what I liked.<br /><br />Several freinds of mine stopped reading here because they disliked the change in Harry's character. Actually, I found it realistic. He's a teenager! So one week you act like the adult you almost are and the next week you act like the kid you recently were! Aren't most teenagers like that?<br /><br />I felt JKR also put a lot of needed infomration in this book. I have read some reviews that said it was</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText14956509594840008941\" style=\"display:none\">With thousands of reviews on this book, I am unlikely to say anything new, so I will just say what I liked.<br /><br />Several freinds of mine stopped reading here because they disliked the change in Harry's character. Actually, I found it realistic. He's a teenager! So one week you act like the adult you almost are and the next week you act like the kid you recently were! Aren't most teenagers like that?<br /><br />I felt JKR also put a lot of needed infomration in this book. I have read some reviews that said it was boring. for me, it was not. I do not need slam bang non stop action to keep me from being broed if other interesting things are happening and they were, imho.<br /><br />I found the character of High Inquisitor Dolores Umbrindge very disturbing and very realistic. Althoug, I did die laughing at the part where Dolores gives that little 'ahem, ahem' cough while Professor Mc Gonagall is speaking and Professor McGonagall snaps \"...are you quite sure you wouldn't like a cough drop, Dolores?\" (p.663)<br /><br />I like Fred and George Weasley's pranks and harrassment of the High InQuisitor and the scene where they decided higher education was not for them and left with bang.<br /><br />And the part where Harry and Dumbledore argue at the end is well done. It was so unusual for those two to disagree---but it was well written.<br /><br />There were a few minor inconsisties and odds and ends that I did not like--but overall my impression of this book it is is one of the better of the series. In books 1, 2, and 3 we had a (excellent) childrens' story; books 4 and 5 are more substantial, more adult in character and still continue the basic series very well.<br /><br />REcommend for all Harry Potter fans. Don't stop at Book 4--this one is too good to miss.</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"14956509594840008941\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" id=\"update_comment_stuff_Review159410405\">\n  <td colspan=\"2\">\n    <div      \n\n<div id=\"review_1033839729\" class=\"review\" itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\"          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Paperback 9780545582971\" href=\"/book/show/17347381-harry-potter-and-the-order-of-the-phoenix\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1033839729\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer2456256908149165629\">It took me a really really long time to finish this, not only because it was really really chunky but also because I had 3 weeks of exams and I've been on vacation for 4 weeks (a youth exchange camp: best thing ever) where I did not have time to read at all! So, I just wanted ro mention that it was absolutely not because it was either draggy or boring or anything like that. <br /><br />I had the most amazing time reading this. Mostly because, I have never ever seen the 5th movie in my life (only the first f</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText2456256908149165629\" style=\"display:none\">It took me a really really long time to finish this, not only because it was really really chunky but also because I had 3 weeks of exams and I've been on vacation for 4 weeks (a youth exchange camp: best thing ever) where I did not have time to read at all! So, I just wanted ro mention that it was absolutely not because it was either draggy or boring or anything like that. <br /><br />I had the most amazing time reading this. Mostly because, I have never ever seen the 5th movie in my life (only the first four movies) (I've seen those a million times) (Never continued... The fuck) So I had NO idea whatsoever of what was going to happen which was a lot of fun because most of the time when you get into a really loved series that everybody knows and which are made into movies....... You know stuff. Well I did not. Not anything. So that was really really exciting! <br /><br />I loved everything. Yes the themes are getting somewhat darker but hey, Harry's growing up, so! Can't keep playin' with those chocolate frogs, right? Lol. The thing I loved the most in this book though was the humour, and especially Ron's! (He is my favorite character so, yeah). <br /><br />I don't want to spoil anything for the people whom are reading this and have not yet read the book but........ I've been on an emotion ride, just saying. </span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"2456256908149165629\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n     \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer10288882516243672107\"><blockquote>U+201CIs it true that you shouted at Professor Umbridge?\"<br>\"Yes.\"<br>\"You called her a liar?\"<br>\"Yes.\"<br>\"You told her He Who Must Not Be Named is back?\"<br>\"Yes.\"<br>\"Have a biscuit, Potter.U+201D </blockquote><br><br><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1380394945ra/760589.gif\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>Well, this was saddest than I remembered. Especially the end. Just like the first time, I didnU+2019t cry, but it was harder for me this time. I laughed a lot as well. I remember Umbridge annoyed me so much it made me enjoy the book less, but now that didnU+2019t happened. Maybe because I knew how it ended. I still hate her though.<br><br>Anyways,</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText10288882516243672107\" style=\"display:none\"><blockquote>U+201CIs it true that you shouted at Professor Umbridge?\"<br>\"Yes.\"<br>\"You called her a liar?\"<br>\"Yes.\"<br>\"You told her He Who Must Not Be Named is back?\"<br>\"Yes.\"<br>\"Have a biscuit, Potter.U+201D </blockquote><br><br><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1380394945ra/760589.gif\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>Well, this was saddest than I remembered. Especially the end. Just like the first time, I didnU+2019t cry, but it was harder for me this time. I laughed a lot as well. I remember Umbridge annoyed me so much it made me enjoy the book less, but now that didnU+2019t happened. Maybe because I knew how it ended. I still hate her though.<br><br>Anyways, great book as all the books in the series. And I enjoyed it way more this time.<br><br><blockquote>U+201CIndifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.U+201D </blockquote><br><br><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1450299502ra/17405800.gif\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>Bueno, fue mU+00E1s triste de lo que me acordaba. Especialmente el final. Como la primera vez, no llorU+00E9, pero me costU+00F3 mU+00E1s esta vez. Me reU+00ED mucho tambiU+00E9n. Me acuerdo que Umbridge me molestaba tanto que hizo que me gustara menos el libro, aunque ahora no me pasU+00F3. Tal vez porque sabU+00EDa como termina el libro. Igual la sigo odiando.<br><br>En definitiva, un libro genial como todos en la serie. Y esta vez lo disfrute mucho mU+00E1s.<br><br></span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"10288882516243672107\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/931874427?book_show_action=false\">May 01, 2015</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Komal\" class=\"user\" name=\"Komal\" href=\"/user/show/25090738-komal\">Komal</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Paperback 9781408855690\" href=\"/book/show/22844196-harry-potter-and-the-order-of-the-phoenix\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer931874427\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer15808759962846296137\">Oh My Gawd, this book is probably my favourite till now. It was absolutely beautiful. Each and every single word made me just so full of feels. J. K. Rowling is hands-down one of the best authors ever. You would think that it's a children's book and it would be childish and all but dude it's absolutely amazing. <br />It started beautifully and ended beautifully. I love her writing style like so much. I got so annoyed that it was taking me so much time to read this, but I had so much homework that I li</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText15808759962846296137\" style=\"display:none\">Oh My Gawd, this book is probably my favourite till now. It was absolutely beautiful. Each and every single word made me just so full of feels. J. K. Rowling is hands-down one of the best authors ever. You would think that it's a children's book and it would be childish and all but dude it's absolutely amazing. <br />It started beautifully and ended beautifully. I love her writing style like so much. I got so annoyed that it was taking me so much time to read this, but I had so much homework that I literally took 2-3 weeks, which is unacceptable. <br /><br />All I wanna say is that this series is life. And I'm not kidding when I say this, after reading each book I see the movie and just feels are flying all over the room. In this book we meet Luna Lovegood and can I just say that I love her so much. She is amazing and the fact that she can read upside-down is pretty cool. I already ship Luna with somebody and I know that the ship that I'm thinking of is true so just feels feels feels. <br /><br />This review does not do justice at all to this book, but I tried. <br /><br />PS- I don't want this series to end so quickly. Like after this is the second last book, like what?</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"15808759962846296137\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" id=\"update_comment_stuff_Review931874427\">\n  <td colspan=\"2\">\n    <div class=\"updateActionLinks\">\n        <a class=\"right flag\" rel=\"nofollow\" id=\"flag_link931874427\" title=\"Flag this review as inappropriate.\" href=\"/flagged/new?resource_id=931874427&resource_type=Review&return_url=/book/show/2.Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix\">flag</a>\n\n\n\n\n\n      <span class='likeItContainer' id='like_container_review_931874427'><a id=\"like_count_review_931874427\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"/rating/voters/931874427?resource_type=Review\"><span class=\"likesCount\">6 likes</span></a>U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<span class=\"loadingLinkSpan\"><a id=\"like_action_review_931874427\" rel=\"nofollow\" data-like-container-id=\"like_container_review_931874427\" ref=\"like\" class=\"jsLike like_it gr-button gr-button--small loadingLink\" data-remote=\"true\" data-method=\"post\" href=\"/rating?count_on_right=false&format=json&lc=6&rating[page]=10&rating[rating]=1&rating[resource_id]=931874427&rating[resource_type]=Review\">Like</a><span class=\"loadingAnimation\"></span><span class=\"loadingError\"></span></span></span>\nU+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<a id=\"commentLink_931874427\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"comment_form_for(&#39;review&#39;, 931874427, true, &#39;&#39;);
